title: AI Agent Development Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive course teaching students to build production-ready AI agents

learners.prerequisites: Basic Python programming and understanding of APIs

arcs.title: Foundations of AI Agents
arcs.arcThemeNarrative: This arc establishes the foundational knowledge needed to understand how AI agents work, including LLM capabilities, prompt engineering patterns, and basic agentic workflows.
arcs.arcProgressionNarrative: Modules progress from basic LLM interaction to structured agent patterns, building up complexity gradually.

modules.title: Introduction to AI Agents
modules.description: Understanding what AI agents are and their capabilities
learningObjectives: Understand the difference between LLMs and AI agents
Identify key capabilities of modern LLMs

moduleData.xmlContent: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Module><ModuleOverview><ModuleDescription>This module introduces learners to AI agents...</ModuleDescription><ModuleObjectives><ModuleObjective><Name>Understand LLM capabilities</Name><Details>Learn what modern LLMs can and cannot do</Details></ModuleObjective><ModuleObjective><Name>Design agent workflows</Name><Details>Create simple agentic patterns</Details></ModuleObjective><ModuleObjective><Name>Implement tool use</Name><Details>Connect agents to external tools</Details></ModuleObjective></ModuleObjectives></ModuleOverview></Module>

modules.title: Prompt Engineering for Agents
modules.description: Advanced prompting techniques for reliable agent behavior

arcs.title: Advanced Agent Patterns
arcs.arcThemeNarrative: This arc covers advanced patterns needed for building production agents, including multi-step workflows, error handling, and observability.
arcs.arcProgressionNarrative: Building on foundations, modules explore increasingly complex agent architectures.

modules.title: Multi-Agent Systems
modules.description: Coordinating multiple agents for complex tasks

modules.title: Production Agent Deployment
modules.description: Taking agents from prototype to production

courseNarrative: This course takes learners from understanding basic LLM capabilities to building and deploying production-ready AI agent systems. Through hands-on projects, students will develop practical skills in agent design, implementation, and deployment.
progressionNarrative: The course progresses from foundational concepts (Arc 1) to advanced production patterns (Arc 2). Each arc builds systematically, allowing learners to consolidate knowledge before tackling more complex challenges.
